ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: I m in total agreement.  I can t speak for solo play, but in group play we simply kick ass.  Even on raids, with the right guild that knows how to use us,
ygData.messageBody:
I'm in total agreement. I can't speak for solo play, but in group play we simply kick ass. Even on raids, with the right guild that knows how to use us, we're no slouches. Thott throws out a lot of numbers about how we don't scale well as we level, but somehow his analysis doesn't mirror my experiences on a daily basis.

Hopefully VI is just looking at "stacking issues" and not anything more grand. :)

Darkfox
Xegony



Ugh....
Its funny... the more I play my bard and the higher she gets, I find myself
sometimes not telling people everything I can do, kind of keeping a low
profile, hoping that they don't notice. Seriously, don't laugh, its just
that bards seem very overpowered to me at higher levels, then again 60
shaman with Can IV.... I used to think all level 60 were equally powerful
but I'm changing my thoughts. I hope nobody else figures this out!

Tani, 54 Bardette
Halana, 60 Shaman
Solusek Ro
